snippet: The idea of lacrosse as a safer alternative to football has taken a hit as two of the most popular helmets are no longer certified as safe.
abstract: National Operating Committee on Standards for Athletic Equipment voids certification of the Warrior Regulator and the Cascade Model R, popular lacrosse helmets worn by tens of thousands of players on top NCAA teams; representatives from both companies say they are working with the standards committee to resolve situation.
lead_paragraph: The idea of lacrosse as a safer alternative to football has taken a hit as two of the most popular helmets are no longer certified as safe.

headline.seo: Safety Organization Deems Popular Helmet Models Unsuitable for Play
headline.main: After 2 Helmets Are Decertified, Lacrosse Faces Safety Concerns
headline.print_headline: After 2 Helmets Are Decertified, Lacrosse Faces Safety Concerns

keywords.value: National Operating Committee on Standards for Athletic Equipment
keywords.name: organizations
